content:
This PR addresses a performance issue I had noticed with gcongr on problems with many variables/hypotheses. Namely, a lot of work was being duplicated in the "forward-reasoning" step of the algorithm (where LocalDecls are being tried against the various goals encountered).

The improvement from this PR is pretty small library-wide, but in certain individual examples the improvement is dramatic: the gcongr runtime (on my laptop) on a newly-added test drops fromÂ 257 ms to 47 ms.
